about_the_game:
After the final concert of ♡beAt, Core Hato, the leader of ♡beAt, has went abroad on a business trip for the cinematography. On the other hand, Suzu Maikaze and Haru Samidare, is about to entry for the new challenge: Idol Season Festival, to start a new chapter of their career.



This DLC includes a new chapter of ♡beAt! -After the Summer-, and new character graphics, new costumes and new characters.
The first chapter is about Suzu Maikaze, and the others will be released in the future.



DLC Characters：



Oui Kokona

A fashionable 16 years old girl with a unique way of speaking.
She was once planned to debut as an unit with Ritsuka Tachibana, but since Ritsuka decided to quit her debut, now she's solo.



Riko Mikawa

Sio Hoshidzuki's victim.
She used to be a famous idol from Star Moon Production, but since all the damage Sio's defamation brings, she has no choice but to quit as an idol.


Ritsuka Tachibana

An accomplice helped Sio and Yuuka during the defamation and the 'dc uproar'.
She was also Koa Aida's senior and offered information to dc.


Ai Tachibana

Ritsuka Tachibana's younger sister. She's also Suzu Maikaze's classmate.
detailed_description:
After the final concert of ♡beAt, Core Hato, the leader of ♡beAt, has went abroad on a business trip for the cinematography. On the other hand, Suzu Maikaze and Haru Samidare, is about to entry for the new challenge: Idol Season Festival, to start a new chapter of their career.



This DLC includes a new chapter of ♡beAt! -After the Summer-, and new character graphics, new costumes and new characters.
The first chapter is about Suzu Maikaze, and the others will be released in the future.



DLC Characters：



Oui Kokona

A fashionable 16 years old girl with a unique way of speaking.
She was once planned to debut as an unit with Ritsuka Tachibana, but since Ritsuka decided to quit her debut, now she's solo.



Riko Mikawa

Sio Hoshidzuki's victim.
She used to be a famous idol from Star Moon Production, but since all the damage Sio's defamation brings, she has no choice but to quit as an idol.


Ritsuka Tachibana

An accomplice helped Sio and Yuuka during the defamation and the 'dc uproar'.
She was also Koa Aida's senior and offered information to dc.


Ai Tachibana

Ritsuka Tachibana's younger sister. She's also Suzu Maikaze's classmate.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+ / SteamOS 1.0
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: ♡beAt! Another Season Episode

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 / DirectX 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: This is a story about 4 girls, who had a desire to become an idol. After the break-up of ♡beAt, they are facing a new challenge and about to stand out.
